channel.title: Amazing game, but needs more Gibbing options!
channel.description:
2nd playthrough for me, disappointed to see gib mechanics (blowing up bodies with damage) do not match HL1 and still have not made it in-game yet.
One great example is corpses being hit by the crowbar. In HL1 they would explode into gibs after like 5 hits, in Black Mesa they just die and you cant gib them after death.
I see you already have gibs fully realized in-game, certain weapons and events cause bodies to explode. Please consider adding this feature! It was so fun to do to zombies in HL1!
